Package com.atakmap.android.navigation.views.buttons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NavButtonsVisibilityListener
    Listener for nav buttons visibility changes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompassButtonChildView
    Menu that is shown when the compass is long-pressed.
    NavButton
    Button used as part of NavView
    NavButtonChildView
    Toolbar shown below the nav button layout
    NavButtonDrawable
    Drawable icon used for NavButton and other nav-related icons Supports dynamic shadow below the icon
    NavButtonShadowBuilder
    Shadow builder for tools that are dragged into the active loadout
    NavZoomButton
    The zoom in/out button displayed on the left side of the screen
